name: Chekrut Goliath
text:
1 FIRE Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower non-Tuner "Chekrut" monster from your GY, but its effects are negated. Once per turn: You can banish 1 FIRE monster in your GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Chekrut Goliath" once per turn.
